quoteText: We do share certain aggregated, non-personally identifying information with others about how our users, collectively, use Bitwarden, or how our users respond to our paid service offerings, such as a premium membership. For example, we may compile statistics on the number of active users on the platform. However, we do not sell this information to advertisers or marketers.
title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
